title: Vanilla&Chocolate-Wonderland Adventures:Mysteries of Fire Island
description:
Alawar and Bigfish Games - RaBBiT games Series

Vanilla & Chocolate  - Alawar

In Vanilla & Chocolate, you set out to grow your small ice cream shop into the country's most popular ice cream brand. The game breaks new ground by combining simulation and time management gameplay into a single unified experience. You will face the challenges of managing your ice cream shops, serving your customers, researching new recipes and upgrading your equipment and furnishings to build the ultimate ice cream empire! Start the adventure now and the delicious gameplay in Vanilla & Chocolate will amaze you!


Wonderland Adventures: Mysteries of Fire Island  - Bigfish

The safety of Wonderland is threatened once more, but the quest to save this world goes terribly wrong. Shipwrecked and marooned on the shores of the mysterious Fire Island, you are cast into an epic puzzle adventure filled with new discoveries, ancient secrets, and a surprising conclusion. Can you uncover the mysteries of Fire Island?
